subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
Memorabilia
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are auctioning thousands of items to help recoup the $11.5 million the team agreed to pay to New York City for the right to gut the publicly owned stadium.
snippet: The Yankees are auctioning thousands of items to help recoup the $11.5 million the team agreed to pay to New York City for the right to gut the publicly owned stadium.
